de.tud.android.locpairs.controller
Class GamingClient

java.lang.Object
  Service
      de.tud.android.locpairs.controller.GamingClient

public class GamingClient
extends Service

The GamingClient handles the synchronization of the application view and the server. Sends broadcasts to activities of the game logic.
